<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
Strength 14, Dexterity 14, or Constitution 14; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Swords

**Access**
A character who is a member of the Pathfinder Society has access to this option.

</column>

---

Your Swords training taught you to never lose hold of your weapon. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when foes attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) you. If you have the [Deft Cooperation](/Feats.aspx?ID=873) feat and critically succeed on a check to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) an ally’s attack roll or skill check, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus from Deft Cooperation (instead of a +1 bonus) the first time you attempt an attack roll or attempt a skill check where the bonus would apply.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Swordmaster archetype.

<title level="2">Swordmaster Dedication leads to...</title>
[Armored Exercise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2262), [Armored Rest](/Feats.aspx?ID=2255), [Death's Door](/Feats.aspx?ID=1142), [Emergency Medical Assistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2258), [Focus Ally](/Feats.aspx?ID=2264), [Forceful Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=2263), [Harrying Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1140), [Improvised Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2250), [Martial Exercise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2256), [Physical Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=2251), [Practiced Defender](/Feats.aspx?ID=2257), [Protect Ally](/Feats.aspx?ID=2252), [Quick Stow (Swordmaster)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2253), [Recollect Studies](/Feats.aspx?ID=2259), [Reflexive Grip](/Feats.aspx?ID=2254), [Rugged Survivalist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2260), [Shoulder Catastrophe](/Feats.aspx?ID=1141), [Tense Negotiator](/Feats.aspx?ID=2261)
